downloadTitle: Visual Studio Team Foundation Server 2015 Management Pack for System Center
downloadDescription: The Visual Studio Team Foundation Server 2015 Management Pack for System Center provides monitoring of Team Foundation Server 2015. It monitors TFS components such as application tier servers, data tier servers, team project collections, build servers, and proxy servers.
detailsSection:
The Visual Studio Team Foundation Server 2015 Management Pack for System Center provides monitoring of Team Foundation Server 2015. It monitors TFS components such as application tier servers, data tier servers, team project collections, build servers, and proxy servers.

Feature Summary: The monitoring provided by this management pack includes availability and configuration monitoring, performance data collection, and default thresholds. You can integrate the monitoring of Team Foundation Server components into your service-oriented monitoring scenarios.
• Performs auto discovery of TFS components
• Implements a hierarchical health model, reflecting the logical architecture of TFS
• Contains tasks, diagnostic and recovery for certain failures
• Provides events that indicate service outages
• Provides alerts that show configuration issues and connected data source changes
• Verifies that all dependent services are running

12/15/2015 Update: New version of Visual Studio Team Foundation Server 2015 Management Pack for System Center posted which resolves an issue related to TFS deployments using SSL. If you are not using SSL in your deployment, there is no need to update to this newer version of the management pack.
systemRequirementsSection:
1. Team Foundation Server 2015
2. System Center Operations Manager 2012 or System Center Operations Manager 2012 R2
installInstructionSection: Please see the management pack guide, MPGuide_TFS2015.docx, for complete installation instructions.
